A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a good film in general\, but it did more bad than good to the star wars franchise and I didn't mind the character of rose. I thought she COULD have added great character development to Finn. But no. What they did with her was bad. Apart from the throwing the lightasber off the cliff thing\, I loved what Rian Johnson did with Luke Skywalker. Watch the film once you've watched episodes 1-3 then Solo then Rogue One then 4-7.
